title: Statement Receive
description: A summary of account statement is received

count.description: Number of transactions returned in this call

balance_after.description: It is the remaining balance Example: 10150.1300

transaction_id.description: It is the transaction id. in statement every contract (buy or sell) and every payment has a unique id. Example: 10867502908

contract_id.description: It is the contract id Example: 4867502908

transaction_time.description: It is the time of transaction Example: 1441175849

action_type.description: It is the type of action Example: buy

amount.description: It is the amount of transaction Example: -83.2300
